com.camerontec.util.concurrent.circularbuffer

Interface Barrier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BarrierBase, BlockingBarrier, SpinAndYieldBarrier, SpinBarrier, SpinYieldAndParkBarrier

    public interface Barrier
    Simple thread barrier interface.

    This interface is similar in nature to java.util.concurrent.CyclicBarrier and is designed to be used when 2 or more interdependent threads producing/consuming to/from a CircularBuffer require some kind of sequencing in order to proceed.

    In the sense that its implied usage is associated with a CircularBuffer this is not a generic, or fully featured, barrier interface.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static long UNAVAILABLE_SEQUENCE_NUMBER
      The sequence number to be returned when a desired sequence number is unavailable.

    • Field Detail

      • UNAVAILABLE_SEQUENCE_NUMBER

        static final long UNAVAILABLE_SEQUENCE_NUMBER
        The sequence number to be returned when a desired sequence number is unavailable.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • await

        long await(long sequenceNumber,
           PaddedLong gatingSequenceNumber)
    throws InterruptedException
        Wait indefinitely or interrupted for the specified sequence number to become available.
        Parameters:
        sequenceNumber - The desired sequence number.
        gatingSequenceNumber - The sequence number on which we are awaiting.
        Returns:
        The maximum sequence number available. This is guaranteed to be ≥ the desired sequence number.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - On being interrupted while waiting for the specified sequence number.

      • await

        long await(long sequenceNumber,
           long timeout,
           TimeUnit timeUnit,
           PaddedLong gatingSequenceNumber)
    throws InterruptedException
        Wait for the specified sequence number to become available or the timeout expires, whichever occurs first.
        Parameters:
        sequenceNumber - The desired sequence number.
        timeout - The maximum wait time. If this is ≤0 then the method returns immediately (i.e. does not wait) regardless of whether the desired sequence number is available or not.
        timeUnit - The timeout units.
        gatingSequenceNumber - The sequence number on which we are awaiting.
        Returns:
        The maximum sequence number available, or UNAVAILABLE_SEQUENCE_NUMBER if the specified sequence number did not become available inside the timeout period.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - On being interrupted while waiting for the specified sequence number.

      • signalAll

        void signalAll()
        Signal all waiters that at least one new sequence number is available.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Shutdown the barrier permanently.

        Any threads currently waiting on the barrier are woken and an InterruptedException will be thrown. Any threads attempting to await(long, PaddedLong) after the barrier is closed will experience the same behaviour.

      • isShutdown

        boolean isShutdown()
        Accessor for the shutdown state of this barrier.
        Returns:
        True if this barrier has been shutdown, false otherwise.
